reviewText: mystery not bad, just don't care for the interpretation. i will keep it because i love all sherlock holmes, even the one with the robot dragon.
Disappointing film considering the big name actors. Also historically and geographically innacurate. More like a home movie than a professionally produced film.

This is one of the worst movies I have ever seen.  It's a shame they were allowed to use the names Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson.

The only performance with any merit was Claude Akins playing Teddy Roosevelt.  He was actually pretty darn good.

But Christopher Lee should stick to vampire movies.
